com.raweng.built

Class BuiltApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.raweng.built.BuiltApplication

  • public class BuiltApplication
extends java.lang.Object
    To fetch application level information of your application from built.io server.
    Author:
    raw engineering, Inc

      Creates new BuiltApplication instance.

      • setApplication

        public void setApplication(java.lang.String apiKey,
                  java.lang.String appUid)
        Sets the api key and Application uid for BuiltApplication class instance.
        Scope is limited to this object only.
        Parameters:
        apiKey - Application api Key of your application on built.io.
        appUid - Application uid of your application on built.io.

      • setHeader

        public void setHeader(java.lang.String key,
             java.lang.String value)
        To set headers for built.io rest calls.
        Scope is limited to this object only.
        Parameters:
        key - header name.
        value - header value against given header name.

      • removeHeader

        public void removeHeader(java.lang.String key)
        Remove a header for a given key from headers.
        Scope is limited to this object only.
        Parameters:
        key - header key.

      • includeApplicationVariables

        public void includeApplicationVariables()
        To include all the "application_variables".

      • fetchApplicationSettings

        public BuiltApplication fetchApplicationSettings(com.raweng.built.BuiltResultCallBack callback)
        To retrieve current application's settings information.
        Parameters:
        callback -   BuiltResultCallBack object to notify the application when the request has completed.
        Returns:
        BuiltApplication object, so you can chain this call.

        Note: You can get application settings data by accessing getAccountName(), getApplicationSettings() , getApplicationKey(), getApplicationUid(), getApplicationName()

      • cancelCall

        public void cancelCall()
        To cancel all BuiltApplication network calls.

      • applicationUserQuery

        public BuiltQuery applicationUserQuery()
        Provides BuiltQuery object to retrieve application user. This method returns an object of BuiltQuery class, all the methods of the BuiltQuery class are available and can be used to query the Application user class of built.io
        Returns:
        BuiltQuery object.

      • getApplicationVariableForKey

        public java.lang.String getApplicationVariableForKey(java.lang.String key)
        To get value of the application variable for the given key.
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the application variable.
        Returns:
        the value for the given key.

      • toJSON

        public JSONObject toJSON()
        Returns JSON representation of this BuiltApplication instance data.
